business.farmerVoice: We farm the hills and valleys around Viroqua. What we grow changes with the season, the soil, and the weather - and we believe that transparency matters.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
paragraphs: You choose a weekly food box. We harvest from our farms and partner farms during the week, based on what's ready and thriving.
Boxes are packed fresh and delivered directly to your door or made available for local pickup in Viroqua at a scheduled time.
Because we work with living soil and changing weather, contents vary week to week. Seasonality isn't a limitation here - it's how freshness happens.

farms.title: Our Farms
paragraphs: The Driftless Region was never flattened by glaciers. Its hills, valleys, and soils demand careful, small-scale farming.
We work with farms in and around Viroqua that grow food suited to this landscape - diverse, seasonal, and rooted in place.
